message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I think you'll find it's a great investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. However, $1,200,000 is still quite a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product.  I believe this is a fair price considering the value to me.

I understand that $1,200,000 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I have to consider the minimum value I need to get for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1,050,000. I think this is a fair compromise.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $1,050,000 is still outside my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $900,000.  I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me and the fact that I am ready to close the deal.

I appreciate your willingness to go up to $900,000, Bob, but I'm still not getting the minimum value I need for the product. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm offering it to you for $1,000,000. This is the best I can do.
